Are Eco-friendly Printers Available for Rent?

July 1, 2025 Marga Enterprises

In todayâ€™s world, going green is no longer a trendâ€”it's a responsibility. From digital offices to paperless meetings, businesses are doing their part to reduce their carbon footprint. One often overlooked but impactful way to become more eco-conscious is by using eco-friendly printers. But what if you donâ€™t want to buy one outright? You might be wondering: Are eco-friendly printers available for rent? The answer is yesâ€”and in this post, weâ€™ll explore why renting one might be your best decision yet.

Why Eco-friendly Printing Matters

Printing may seem like a small part of your operations, but it can have a big impact on both your bottom line and the planet. Traditional printers consume high amounts of electricity, use non-recyclable toner cartridges, and contribute to electronic waste when replaced frequently.

Eco-friendly printers are designed to address these concerns. These printers:

  • Use energy-efficient technology (like Energy Star-rated systems)

  • Support duplex printing to save paper

  • Are compatible with eco-friendly ink and toner

  • Offer recyclable materials and parts

  • Produce less heat and noise, making them ideal for small, quiet offices

Can You Rent an Eco-friendly Printer?

Yes, eco-friendly printers are available for rent. Many printer rental providers now include green options in their fleet to accommodate businesses that care about sustainability.

Renting an eco-friendly printer gives you access to the latest models without the high upfront costs. It also means you wonâ€™t have to worry about maintenance, repair, or eventual disposal, which further reduces environmental waste.

To get started, check this helpful overview of what is printer rental and how it works for different types of businesses.

What Types of Eco-friendly Printers Can You Rent?

Printer rental companies offer a wide range of sustainable printers for different needs. Some of the most common options include:

1. Laser Printers with Energy-saving Features

Modern laser printers come with automatic sleep modes and reduced power usage when idle.

2. Inkjet Printers Using Recyclable Cartridges

These use water-based inks and biodegradable cartridges, making them ideal for companies with lower print volumes.

3. Multi-function Printers (MFPs)

These all-in-one machines print, scan, copy, and faxâ€”reducing the need for multiple devices and saving energy.

4. Printers Using Eco-toners or Soy-based Inks

These are less harmful to the environment and produce fewer volatile organic compounds (VOCs).

You can learn more about the available options through this detailed guide on what types of printers you can rent.

Benefits of Renting Eco-friendly Printers

Renting an eco-friendly printer offers several advantages, especially for small to medium-sized businesses. Here are some of the top benefits:

âœ… Lower Upfront Costs

No need to invest a huge amount in buying a printer. Rental lets you pay monthly.

âœ… Regular Maintenance

Most rental packages include free maintenance and repair, ensuring your printer works efficiently at all times.

âœ… Access to the Latest Models

Stay updated with the newest eco-technologies without constantly replacing your equipment.

âœ… Flexible Rental Terms

Need a printer for a month? A year? More? You can choose a term that fits your business. Learn more about how long you can rent a printer.

âœ… Reduced E-waste

Once the rental term ends, the provider takes back the unit for proper recycling or refurbishment.

How Much Does It Cost to Rent an Eco-friendly Printer?

You might think eco-friendly printers are expensiveâ€”but with rental, they become surprisingly affordable. The cost depends on factors such as:

  • Type and model of the printer

  • Length of the rental period

  • Printing capacity (pages per month)

  • Included services (like supplies or support)

Prices typically start as low as â‚±1,500 to â‚±3,000 per month for basic eco-models, with high-volume units priced higher.

Check this breakdown of how much printer rental costs for more details.

Whatâ€™s Included in a Printer Rental Agreement?

Before signing any rental agreement, itâ€™s good to know whatâ€™s included. Most eco-printer rental packages cover the following:

  • Delivery and installation

  • Routine maintenance and check-ups

  • Toner or ink replacements

  • On-call technical support

  • Replacement parts when needed

You can read more about what is included in a printer rental agreement to understand all the benefits and avoid hidden fees.

Things to Consider Before Renting an Eco-friendly Printer

If you're planning to rent, consider the following:

1. Printing Volume

Estimate how many pages you print each month. This helps match you with the right eco-printer.

2. Green Certifications

Look for printers with Energy Star, EPEAT, or Blue Angel certifications to ensure real eco-benefits.

3. Ink or Toner Type

Make sure the printer supports eco-friendly ink and recyclable toner. Ask your provider about options.

4. Support and Maintenance

Choose a rental company that includes regular maintenanceâ€”an essential part of keeping your printer eco-efficient.

Final Thoughts: Make the Sustainable Choice

So, are eco-friendly printers available for rent? Absolutely! And they offer a smart, affordable, and responsible alternative to traditional printers. By renting, your business can:

  • Lower costs

  • Reduce environmental impact

  • Enjoy updated, energy-efficient technology

  • Avoid the hassle of ownership and maintenance

Whether you're a small startup or a growing enterprise, renting an eco-friendly printer is a simple step that aligns your operations with sustainability goals.

Ready to make the switch?
